name: Generate Key Pair
description: Generates a new key pair.

name: Generate Full Key Pair
description: Generates a new key pair with more control over the process.

name: List Public Keys
description: Lists all keys in your public keyring.

name: List Public Keys (short)
description: Lists all keys in your public keyring.

name: List Secret Keys
description: Lists all secret keys.

name: List Secret Keys (short)
description: Lists all secret keys.

name: Show Key Fingerprints
description: Shows fingerprints along with the keys.

name: Export Public Key
description: Exports a public key in ASCII armor format.

name: Export Secret Key
description: Exports a secret key in ASCII armor format.

name: Export Specific Subkey
description: Exports a specific subkey.

name: Import Public Key
description: Imports a public key.

name: Import Private Key
description: Imports a private key.

name: Verify Key Fingerprint
description: Verifies the fingerprint of a key.

name: Sign Public Key
description: Signs someone's public key.

name: Sign and Export Key
description: Signs with your own key and exports the signature.

name: Generate Revocation Certificate
description: Generates a revocation certificate.

name: Revoke Key
description: Revokes a key using the certificate.

name: Edit Key
description: Edits a key (change expiration, add/remove email addresses, etc.).

name: Mark Key as Trusted
description: Marks a key as trusted.

name: Send Key to Keyserver
description: Sends a key to a keyserver.

name: Receive Key from Keyserver
description: Receives a key from a keyserver.

name: Search for Key on Keyserver
description: Searches for a key on a keyserver.

name: Refresh Keys from Keyserver
description: Refreshes all keys from a keyserver.

name: Encrypt File
description: Encrypts a file for a specific recipient.

name: Encrypt File with ASCII Armor
description: Encrypts a file for a specific recipient with ASCII armor output.

name: Encrypt File for Multiple Recipients
description: Encrypts a file for multiple recipients.

name: Encrypt File with Symmetric Cipher
description: Encrypts a file with a symmetric cipher (password-based).

name: Decrypt File
description: Decrypts a file.

name: Decrypt and Verify Signed File
description: Decrypts and verifies a signed, encrypted file.

name: Create Cleartext Signature
description: Creates a cleartext signature.

name: Create Detached Signature
description: Creates a detached signature.

name: Create ASCII Armored Detached Signature
description: Creates an ASCII armored detached signature.

name: Sign and Encrypt File
description: Signs and encrypts a file in one step.

name: Verify Signature
description: Verifies a signature.

name: Verify Detached Signature
description: Verifies a detached signature.

name: Verify and Decrypt Signed File
description: Verifies and decrypts a signed, encrypted file.

name: Fetch Key Using WKD
description: Fetches a key using WKD.

name: Fetch and Import Keys Using WKD
description: Fetches and imports keys for multiple email addresses using WKD.

name: Create Web Key Directory Structure
description: Creates a Web Key Directory structure.

name: Use a specific keyserver
description: Use a specific keyserver for key operations.
